service-duplication-questionnaireIndicator questions recording whether the patient receives assistance from a variety of programs, as well as other social and healthcare needs.
service-duplication-questionsQuestions regarding service duplication.
housing-programIndicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient currently receives or is on any housing waitlists (e.g., HUD. Section 8, local housing authority, or other voucher programs).LOINC LA32-8: No
nutritional-education-programIndicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient currently receives nutritional counseling or education.LOINC LA32-8: No
nutritional-services-programIndicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient is actively engaged in a nutrition program.LOINC LA32-8: No
food-service-programIndicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient currently receives any home-delivered meals or food services.LOINC LA32-8: No
snapp-programIndicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient is currently engaged in SNAP.LOINC LA32-8: No
wic-programIndicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient is currently engaged in WIC.LOINC LA32-8: No
tanf-programIndicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient is currently engaged in TANF.LOINC LA32-8: No
transportation-programIndicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient is currently engaged in Transportation services.LOINC LA33-6: Yes
medication-requiring-refrigerationIndicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient is currently prescribed medication, requiring refrigeration for the management of a chronic condition.LOINC LA32-8: No
breast-milk-requiring-refrigerationIndicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient is a pregnant/postpartum persons that require a refrigeration for breast milk.LOINC LA32-8: No
adls-iadlsIndicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient currently has Activities of Daily Living (ADLs) & Instrumental Activities of Daily Living (IADLs) needs.LOINC LA32-8: No
medical-respiteIndicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient meets the qualifications for medical respite (see notes).LOINC LA32-8: No
childcare-assistanceIndicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient needs assistance with childcare.LOINC LA32-8: No
